txt.en: Your attacks leave opponents shaken, hobbled and unable to escape your onslaught.

#1:[placeholder]: While utilizing the Red Dawn Discipline the following skills will slow the enemy movement speed when they critically hit: #1:{None|Ride By, Keen Strike[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Destabilizing Strike[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Bond of the Rider[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Dirge, Cry of the Eorlingas, Call of the Eorlingas, Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Fixation of Flame, Oration of Embers, Resolution of Fire[K]|Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]|Slash, Bee Swarm, Execute[B]| Momentous Hit[R]|Quick Strike[O]}
